body_html:
same issue on jan 23
ubuntu 16.04 cuda9.1 cudnn7.04 bazel 0.9
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
git checkout r1.4
./configure
bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
vi pip_package_build2.log
clearly failed to build..usual message about bazel caches
bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
vi pip_package_build2.log
worked
body_text:
same issue on jan 23
ubuntu 16.04 cuda9.1 cudnn7.04 bazel 0.9
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
git checkout r1.4
./configure
bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
vi pip_package_build2.log
clearly failed to build..usual message about bazel caches
bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
vi pip_package_build2.log
worked
body:
same issue on jan 23
ubuntu 16.04 cuda9.1 cudnn7.04 bazel 0.9
git clone https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow
cd tensorflow
git checkout r1.4
./configure
 bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
 vi pip_package_build2.log   
                          clearly failed to build..usual message about bazel caches
 bazel build -c opt --copt=-march="haswell" --config=cuda --verbose_failures --incompatible_load_argument_is_label=false //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package >pip_package_build2.log 2>&1
 vi pip_package_build2.log 
worked
